title: Let's Talk Lore
body:
Hello Everyone, 

I started playing a while back and what drew me in was the lore. How There was a story behind every character and there was a reason for their abilities and dialogue to be what it is.

-Let's start with Soraka, she was the first aspect of the cosmos and  Warwick ruined her life as a mad chemist and as a commoner. Now that Warwick is just some guy Singed turned into a chimera. Soraka needs an update.

-On that same note, Warwick was a beast from the beginning, he unleashed chaos during the war with Ionia and Singed was his student but tables turned and now Warwick is just Singed's creation.

-Caitlin, who is C? How did he survive the fall? Why isn't C a champion yet?

-The Rune Wars, World Runes, Rize now seeking them. What happened there? Why the war? Poor Skarner and his brethren.

-Now that we have knowledge on Icathia and how they led the void into Valoran. Did it only affect Icathia or did it spread? Vastaya are the result of humans escaping the Void War and Vastayashai'rei (So it obviously got as far as Ionia). The Watchers rule the void and seems like they had the most influence at the Freljord creating the Iceborn and all. 

-I also would love some Clarifying on the timeline. I know most champions are alive and some have been alive since Aurelion created Runeterra. Like can we have some cool thing with how things have progress and stuff like that like:

Year X Creation of Runeterra - Year X Rune Wars (This and This Happened) - Year X Great Void War (This Happened, This Champion Showed Up)

-Also, are disputes still settled in the League of Legends, like Ionia and Noxus was? Why don't we have more events like this? Why don't we have missions to play with Champions in a specific role or factions? Honestly if we're not gonna get EA from matches might as well give us missions every day.

-Did anyone survive the Blessed Isles Massacre? People from Icathia survived, can we get champs hailing from these places? Also, all those places that haven't been touched In years like:

Ironspike Mountain, Urtistan, Fyrone Flats, Kumungu, Plague Jungles, Sablestone Mountains, Voodoo Lands, Tempest Flast, Mogron Pass, Mount Garganinan, Bubbling Bog, Serpentine River. (We need the map updated)

Are there other continents or is Valoran the Pangaea of Runeterra?

And can we have League Judgement back? That was pretty cool.

I have a lot of other stuff in mind but this is long enough.

replies.body:
Hello.  You activated my trap card (or rather, you mentioned maps, and that's got a better than evens chance of summoning me).  Unfortunately, not the answers you might want, but info at least?

> [{quoted}](name=Lloyd Castagnier,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=uMGqVEXE,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-03-06T17:13:13.431+0000)
> 
> ...Year X Creation of Runeterra - Year X Rune Wars (This and This Happened) - Year X Great Void War (This Happened, This Champion Showed Up)
> 

Timeline.  Yes, quite a few players have mentioned being confused about when events have happened, and their relations.  We have one, but we're hoping to release more information after...

> ...Ironspike Mountain, Urtistan, Fyrone Flats, Kumungu, Plague Jungles, Sablestone Mountains, Voodoo Lands, Tempest Flast, Mogron Pass, Mount Garganinan, Bubbling Bog, Serpentine River. (We need the map updated)
> 
> ...Are there other continents or is Valoran the Pangaea of Runeterra?

...We release a new map of the three (count em) continents that have been featured in the lore so far.  I keep saying we're going to release a new map (and we are!) but it's not being released today.  This year (unless disaster occurs) but not immediately.

Sounds like you've been away from the lore for a little while now, so while I agree with GreenLore's suggestion to check out Universe (which is trying to become the one-stop-shop for story in League) I can link you specifically to one of the more recent partial maps: the [Medarda Heirloom](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/piltover/medarda-heirloom) showing the area around Piltover and Zaun, as far north as Noxus, and a bit of the Shuriman continent too.

Welcome back? :)

Soraka is high priority. That's all I can say for now. :-)

Thanks for coming back to check out the lore, though. I hope you enjoy where we're heading in 2018.
please go with the targon route for her. ionia may be her original home but it doesn't make sense now.

Someone who lost part of her being by giving in to despair and anger. It was just so good, even if you had to dig around a bit to get all the details, case in point being that she was mentioned in old Karma's League Judgment. Just... bring back the celestial being defined by war, and not the dumb unicorn that got lured out of her magic glade. Please?
What about Twitch? His lore was passed over in the Zaun/Piltover update and, while its not out of place, it leaves a hole waiting to be filled. I think there is a lot that could be done for him.
